label: none
description: None, chemotherapy was not part of the first course of therapy or there was progression of disease prior to administration; Not customary therapy for this cancer. Diagnosed at autopsy.

label: administered, NOS
description: Chemotherapy was administered, but type and number of agents is not documented in patient record.

label: not administered, patient risk factors
description: Chemotherapy was not recommended/administered because it was contraindicated due to patient risk factors (comorbid conditions, advanced age) or there was progression of disease prior to planned administration.

label: not administered, patient death
description: Chemotherapy was not administered because the patient died prior to planned or recommended therapy.

label: recommended, not administered, NOS
description: Chemotherapy was recommended by the patient's physician, but was not administered as part of first-course therapy. No reason was stated in the patient record.

label: recommended, refused
description: Chemotherapy was not administered; it was recommended by the patient's physician, but this treatment was refused by the patient, the patient's family member, or the patient's guardian. The refusal was noted in the patient record.

label: recommended, unknown if administered
description: Chemotherapy was recommended, but it is unknown if it was administered.
